.. include:: ../API.rst

============
API
============


.. altair-plot::
    :output: repr

    from vega_datasets import data

    df = data.seattle_weather()
    df.head()




and 


.. altair-plot::

    
import altair as alt

    alt.Chart(df).mark_tick().encode(
        x='precipitation',
    )
